article:
'Challenges' is a romantic comedy film directed by Sri Lankan director
Udayakantha Warnasuriya. Pubudu Chathuranga, Sheshadri Priyasad and
Roshan Ranawana played the leading roles as Ranuk, Sharanya and Kishan. it
became the first Sri Lankan box office hit of 2011. challenges was released on
11 March 2011 nationally and premiered at the Savoy Theatre, Wellawatte on 10
March in a celebrity premiere screening.
